title: Is We Dumb? | Jousting. Lazy River. Sticker. Tommy Lee Jones.
description:
The crazy thing about natural rivers, is that they never go in a circle. EVER. No matter what someone on a bridge tells you. Let's talk about that, having your life threatened over a sticker, Tommy Lee Jones in a completely new light, kind people raising over a million dollars for Ukraine citizens, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?! 

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/WkeTPaCOrAw

 

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com
